item.title: About Me
item.description: I’ve been doing sysadmin/managerial work for about 7 years now and have always had a curiosity about the infosec side of my jobs. About 2 years ago, I took on an IT management role and figured that was where I would be gearing my skills towards. Because of my combined sysadmin/management experience, I snagged the role of the IT/IS Officer at a small local bank. This position is what got me looking into the vast domain that is Information Security.
